attributes.action: MOVE SCHOOL SUMMER HOLIDAYS FORWARD A MONTH
attributes.additional_details: Move the school summer holidays forward a month so the children can have decent July weather not miserable August weather , the current holidays were established so children could help with the harvest in August, they don't do that any more so lets move it to nicer weather with more daylight and less wasps,it would also benefit children and parents who take staycations and currently sit looking out at the rain.
